Name: Candy Adventure
About the game: One day a little puppy Candy goes for a walk. Walking is Candy's most favorite thing. Candy enters the strange door while he is playing. What will happen to Candy? Key Features - Solve puzzles using two portals that can be created. - More than 30 stages. - Easy controls. - Story that goes through Cut scenes and Dialogue. - Cute Candy and his friends. - Comfortable graphics.
